definition: to make (intrans. be) unsteady, i.e. weak

translations.bg: да направи (да бъде) нестабилен, т.е. слаб
translations.da: at gøre (intrans. være) ustabil, dvs. svag
translations.el: να κάνω (intrans. να είμαι) ασταθές, δηλαδή αδύναμο
translations.es: hacer (intrans. ser) inestable, es decir, débil
translations.ja: 不安定にする、つまり弱くする
translations.lt: padaryti (intrans. būti) nestabilų, t. y. silpną
translations.nb: å gjøre (intrans. være) ustø, dvs. svak
translations.nl: onvast maken (intrans. zijn), d.w.z. zwak maken
translations.pt: tornar (intrans. ser) instável, ou seja, fraco
translations.ro: a face (intrans. a fi) instabil, adică slab
translations.sk: urobiť (intrans. byť) nestabilným, t. j. slabým
translations.sv: att göra (intrans. vara) ostadig, dvs. svag
translations.tr: kararsız, yani zayıf hale getirmek (intrans. be)
